title: Announcing the first SHA-1 collision | Hacker News
description: The visual description of the colliding files, at http://shattered.io/static/pdf_format.png, is not very helpful in understanding how they produced the PDFs, so I took apart the PDFs and worked it out.Basically, each PDF contains a single large (421,385-byte) JPG image, followed by a few PDF commandâ€¦
